profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Fa'aali le ulua'i i tafatafa o le fa'aliliuga

profile.themeFreeNotice: O lo'o e i le Free ‚Äî fa'aoga le Sun/Moon vave i lalo. Fa'afou e tatala ai isi autu.
profile.backupDesc: Fausia backups puipuia i le upu fa'a'oga mo ki, ma toe fa'afo'i i se isi masini e fa'asinotonu ai.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Fa'apupuni pe a le fa'ataulai le app
profile.notifyOnCopy: Fa'ailoa pe a kopi e se isi la'u fe'au
profile.loadFailed: Le manuia le la'uina o le talaaga
profile.unfollowFailed: Le manuia le le toe mulimuli
profile.followHint: O a latou tala o le a fa'aalia i lau feed Mulimuli pe a latou tu'uina atu mo Tagata Mulimuli (po'o Fa'alaua'itele).
profile.sectionCrashedTitle: Le mafai ona la'uina le vaega
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Sa i ai se fa'afitauli i lenei vaega.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fa'asolo mai vala'au ma fe'au i lau telefoni po'o lau imeli ua fa'amaonia. E mafai e vala'au/fe'au o lo'o alu ese ona fa'aali lau numera Chatforia.
profile.forwardSaveFailed: Le manuia le sefeina o fa'atulagaga
profile.errSmsDest: Filifili se tasi le itiiti ifo o taunu'uga (telefoni po'o imeli).
profile.errQuietHours: E tatau ona i le va o le 0 ma le 23 itula le 'quiet hours'.

support.heading: E fa'apefea ona matou fesoasoani?
support.contactIntro: O le a matou imeli atu le tali. Tu'u mai fa'amatalaga e mafai ai ona toe faia le fa'afitauli.
support.sent: Ua auina le savali. O le a matou tali atu i le imeli.
support.sendError: Le mafai ona auina. Imeli i le support@chatforia.com.

chat.selectPrompt: Filifili se tusitusiga po'o se potu talanoaga e amata ai le talanoaga
chat.emptySubtitle: Auina se fe'au e amata ai se talanoaga.

feature.privacy: Muamua le tuma'oti. O au fa'amaumauga, o lau pule.

hero.sub: Fa'alilolilo pito-i-le-pito, fa'aliliuga AI, fe'au mou atu, ma vala'au leo/viti≈ç.

feat.privacy: Muamua le tuma'oti. O au fa'amaumauga, o lau pule.

home.title: Amataga
home.subheader: Auina se fe'au e amata ai se talanoaga.

press.title: Laupepa
press.contactLine: Mo fesili a le aufaasƒÅlalau, tusi mai i
press.boilerplateBody: O le Chatforia o se app fe'au e muamua le tuma'oti ma fa'afaigofie ai talanoaga i gagana eseese. O fe'au e fa'alilolilo pito-i-le-pito i le masani, ma o lo'o iai fa'aliliuga taimi moni mo le 100+ gagana. E mafai e tagata fa'aoga ona fa'agaoioi fe'au mou atu, filifili faitauga faitau, ma fa'asinotonu masini. E maua i iOS, Android, ma le upega.
press.assetsSubtitle: Logo, pueata, ma ata o le oloa.
press.scanTip: I luga o le komepiuta? Skena i lau telefoni e aumai le app.
press.appStore: La'u mai i le App Store

careers.title: Galuega
careers.intro: O matou o se 'au la'ititi o lo'o fausia se fe'au saogalemu ma fa'avaomalo. Afai e te tausia le fa'alilolilo, avanoa, ma le matagofie o le UX, matou te fia fa'alogo mai.
careers.openRoles: Nofoaga avanoa: Inisinia (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Oloa, Lagolago.
careers.apply: Fa'afefea ona talosaga: Imeli lau CV/so'otaga i le jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: E uiga i Chatforia
about.description: O le Chatforia o se fe'au saogalemu, tele-gagana ma le fa'alilolilo pito-i-le-pito, fa'aliliuga vave, ma vala'au leo/viti≈ç. O la matou misiona faigofie: fesoasoani i tagata ia feso'ota'i‚Äîsaogalemu, tuma'oti, ma sopo'ia gagana.

values.privacy: <bold>Muamua le tuma'oti:</bold> Fa'alilolilo pito-i-le-pito i le masani.
values.access: <bold>Avanoa mo tagata uma:</bold> Fa'aliliu otometi 100+ gagana.
values.control: <bold>Pulea:</bold> Fe'au mou atu & faitauga faitau e filifiliga.
values.privacy_aria: Muamua le tuma'oti: Fa'alilolilo pito-i-le-pito i le masani.
values.access_aria: Avanoa mo tagata uma: Fa'aliliu otometi 100+ gagana.
values.control_aria: Pulea: Fe'au mou atu ma faitauga faitau e filifiliga.

about.howTitle: Auala e galue ai le Chatforia
about.howDescription: E fa'alilolilo fe'au i lau masini a'o le'i alu ese. O fa'aliliuga, backups, ma le fa'asinotonu o masini e mamanuina e fa'aitiitia ai mea e mafai e a matou 'au'aunaga ona va'ai.

advertise.title: Fa'asalalau ma Chatforia
advertise.description: Aapa i tagata fa'aaoga fe'au i ni nofoaga lelei ma le faaaloalo. E iai a matou 'banner' i nofoaga va'aia, fa'atasi ma fa'amaopoopoga ma fa'alauiloa a le fale. E le va'ai fa'asalalauga tagata totogi Premium.

adsense.withPubId: O lo'o matou tautuaina fa'asalalauga e ala i le Google AdSense. Afai e te fia taula'i mai e ala i Google Ads, fa'aoga le publisher ID {{pubId}} ma talosaga mo le managed placement i iunite o lo'o i lalo. E avanoa fo'i fa'amaopoopoga tu'usa'o‚Äîfa'aoga le pepa.
adsense.noPubId: O lo'o matou tautuaina fa'asalalauga e ala i le Google AdSense. E avanoa fo'i fa'amaopoopoga tu'usa'o‚Äîfa'aoga le pepa i lalo.

advertise.noPlacements: Leai ni nofoaga ua fa'atulaga. Fa'aopoopo i le ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Tele taimi asiasi ma nofo umi i le UI o talanoaga
why.brandSafe: Fa'atusa saogalemu; tapula'a fa'alaupapa (frequency capping) ma le faaaloalo
why.sponsoredMoments: Taimi fa'amaopoopo (fa'ata'ita'iga, ‚ÄúStart a Chat‚Äù modal) e avanoa
why.deals: Feagaiga tu'usa'o po'o polokalame e ala i AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Fa'afetai! Ua lafo lau fesili. O le a matou tali vave atu.
form.missingRequired: Fa'amolemole fa'atumu le igoa, imeli, ma le savali.
form.successToast: Fa'afetai! O le a matou fesootai atu lata mai.
form.mailtoInfo: O lo'o tatalaina lau imeli client e lafo le fesili‚Ä¶
form.messagePlaceholder: Taula'iga, aso, KPI, mea e te mana'o ai‚Ä¶

legal.disclaimerStart: I le lafoina, ua e ioe i a matou

upgrade.title: Fa'afou
upgrade.subtitle: Filifili le fuafuaga sa'o mo oe: ave'ese fa'asalalauga i le Plus, po'o maua foliga atoa i le Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: O le a muta le lesitala
scheduleBanner.body: O le a toe foi i Free i le

plus.title: Plus
plus.desc: Le tau taugofie e aunoa ma fa'asalalauga.

premiumMonthly.title: Premium (Masina)
premiumMonthly.desc: Vaega atoa, 'ringtones', ma mea faigaluega AI mamana.

premiumAnnual.title: Premium (Tausaga)

features.sameFeatures: Tutusa foliga e pei o le Masina

premiumAnnual.disclaimer: Totogi muamua. E mafai ona fa'aumaina so'o se taimi. Leai ni pili natia.

marketing.plusDesc: Le tau taugofie e aunoa ma fa'asalalauga.
marketing.premiumMonthlyDesc: Vaega atoa, ringtones, ma AI mamana.
marketing.annualDisclaimer: Totogi muamua. E mafai ona fa'aumaina so'o se taimi. Leai ni pili natia.

gettingStarted.title: Amata Vave
gettingStarted.subtitle: Fou i Chatforia? O lenei ta'iala vave e fa'aali mea tƒÅua ina ia e amata galue i ni nai minute.

alert.text: O le a fa'atupula'ia lenei ta'iala a'o matou fa'alauiloa foliga fou. Afai e misi se mea, ta'u mai e ala i le

section1.title: 1) Fausia lau tala
section1.loginText: i lau tala o lo'o iai.

section2.title: 2) Amata fe'au
section2.item1: Fausia se DM po'o se Kulupu ma auina lau fe'au muamua.
section2.item2: Fa'aoga fa'aliliuga vave e talanoa i le 100+ gagana.
section2.item3: Taumafai fe'au mou atu ma faitauga faitau i Talaaga ‚Üí Tuma'oti.

section3.title: 3) Alu mamao
section3.item1Part2: it≈´lau (Plus = leai se fa'asalalauga, Premium = foliga atoa).
section3.item2Part1: So'oga isi masini ma seti backups fa'ailogaina i

account.q: E fa'apefea ona fai po'o toe maua la'u tala?
account.a: La'u le app po'o fa'aoga le upega, kiliki ‚ÄúFausia tala‚Äù, fa'amaonia lau imeli/telefoni. Mo le toe fa'afo'i, fa'aoga ‚ÄúGalo le upu fa'a'oga‚Äù.

privacy.a: Ioe. O fe'au ma vala'au e fa'alilolilo pito-i-le-pito i le masani. Na'o oe ma le e te talanoa i ai e mafai ona faitau.

translate.a: Fa'agaoioi ‚ÄúFa'aliliu otometi‚Äù i Fa'atulagaga ‚Üí Vaaiga & Gagana. E fa'aliliu i luga o le masini pe a mafai, a leai e ala i API saogalemu ma fa'amatalaga itiiti.

contact.a: Tusi mai i support@chatforia.com. Fa'aopoopo 'screenshot' ma lau version app.

contact.title: Fa'afeso'ota'i Matou
contact.successMsg: Fa'afetai‚Äîo le a tali atu le matou 'au e ala i le imeli.
contact.errorSend: Le mafai ona auina. Fa'amolemole imeli i le support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: O lenei Faiga Fa'alilolilo e fa'amatalaina ai le auala e aoina ai, fa'aaoga, ma fa'asoa e le Chatforia (‚Äúmatou‚Äù) fa'amatalaga pe a e fa'aoga a matou app ma auaunaga. Ua mamanuina le Chatforia e fa'aitiitia ai fa'amatalaga e mafai ona matou va'ai i ai.

infoWeCollect.title: Fa'amatalaga matou te aoina
infoWeCollect.account: Fa'amatalaga tala (fa'ata'ita'iga, imeli/telefoni) e fai ma puipuia lau tala.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Anotusi fa'ailogaina (fe'au/vala'au) e fa'alilolilo pito-i-le-pito; e le mafai ona matou faitauina.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Fa'aletonu/usage e pei o crash logs, ituaiga masini, po'o fa'amaumauga laiti mo le fa'aleleia.

howWeUse.title: Fa'afefea ona matou fa'aaoga
howWeUse.provide: Tu'uina atu ma puipuia le auaunaga (fa'amaoniga, spam/sauaga).

sharing.title: Fa'asoa
sharing.body: Matou te le fa'atau atu fa'amaumauga patino. E mafai ona fa'asoa ni fa'amatalaga la'itiiti i pa'aga fa'agaoioi (fa'ata'ita'iga, 'push', su'esu'ega) i lalo o konekarate mautu.

rights.title: Au aia tatau
rights.body: Fa'alagolago i lou itulagi (fa'ata'ita'iga, GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), e mafai ona e talosaga e maua, sa'o, soloia, po'o te'ena nisi fa'agasologa. Fa'afeso'ota'i: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Taofi & Saogalemu o Fa'amaumauga
retention.body: Matou te taofia na'o mea e mana'omia mo le auaunaga ma fa'aoga puipuiga masani o alamanuia. E le mafai ona matou tatala le anotusi fa'alilolilo.

children.title: Tamaiti
children.body: E le fa'atatau le Chatforia mo i latou i lalo o le 13 (po'o e pei ona mana'omia e lau tulafono).

changes.title: Suiga
changes.body: O le a matou tu'u iinei suiga ma fa'afou le aso ‚ÄúFa'afouga mulimuli‚Äù.

intro.body: I le fa'aogaina o Chatforia ua e ioe i nei Tu'utu'uga. Afai e te le ioe, aua le fa'aoga le auaunaga.

accounts.title: Tala
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Tu'u mai fa'amatalaga sa'o ma tausi lau fa'ailoga i le saogalemu.
accounts.itemResponsibility: O oe e nafa ma mea uma e faia i lau tala.

acceptableUse.title: Fa'aaoga talafeagai
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Aua le anotusi fa'asolitulafono, saua, po'o solitulafono; aua le spam po'o le fa'aoga otometi fa'aleaga.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: E mafai ona matou taofia/tape mo soliga.

yourContent.title: Lau anotusi
yourContent.body: E tumau ou aia i lau anotusi. E te tu'uina mai ia i matou aia tatau talafeagai e fa'agaoioi ai le auaunaga (fa'ata'ita'iga, auina, teuina, fa'aliliuga).

disclaimer.title: Fa'amal≈´ & noataga
disclaimer.body: E tu'uina le auaunaga ‚Äúpei ona iai‚Äù e aunoa ma ni folafolaga. I le tapula'a maualuga o le tulafono, e le noatia Chatforia mo ni mea le o'o sa'o po'o mea fa'alƒì-tonu.

changes.title: Suiga
changes.body: E mafai ona matou fa'afou nei tu'utu'uga; o le fa'aauau ona fa'aoga pe a uma suiga o lona uiga o lou taliaina.

doNotSell.title: Aua le Fa'atau pe Fa'asoa la'u Fa'amatalaga Patino
doNotSell.body: E le fa'atau e le Chatforia fa'amatalaga patino. E mafai pea e tagatanu'u o Kalefonia ona tu'uina talosaga i lalo o le CPRA e ala i le ki i lalo.

cookies.title: Fa'atulagaga Kukisi
cookies.body: E fa'aoga e Chatforia kukisi fa'aitiiti (fa'ata'ita'iga, 'session', saogalemu). E le fa'aoga kukisi fa'asalalauga a vaega lona tolu. Pulea kukisi i fa'atulagaga a lau su'esu'e.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Le mafai ona la'uina le tulaga o le numera telefoni.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Leai se numera ua tofia. Filifili e ala i le 'area code' e amata ai le fe'au.

startChatModal.title: Amata se talanoaga
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Tusi se igoa, username, telefoni, po'o imeli‚Ä¶
startChatModal.startWithSelected: Amata talanoaga ma i latou ua filifilia
startChatModal.searchByUsernameOrPhone: Su'e e ala i le username po'o le telefoni
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Tusi se username po'o se telefoni ma fetaomi Su'e.
startChatModal.pickAtLeastOne: Filifili le itiiti ifo ma le tasi e mauaina.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: O telefoni/imeli o le a avanoa pe a uma ona e sefeina i feso'ota'iga.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Le manuia le amataina o talanoaga ma i latou ua filifilia.

sounds.freeNotice: O lo'o e i le Free ‚Äî e fa'aalia ae loka leo Premium. Fa'afou e tatala uma.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: E mana'omia le fuafuaga Premium mo lenei foliga.

aiSettings.title: Fa'atulagaga AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Pulea fa'aliliuga, tali atamai, ma tali otometi a ForiaBot.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Fa'aliliu otometi fe'au o lo'o sau
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Fa'aali le ulua'i i tafatafa o le fa'aliliuga
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Auina atu i le AI ni fe'au talu ai (ua fa'amamƒÅ) e fautuaina ai tali vave.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Nana upu masoa i fautuaga AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Afai e ki, o fautuaga a le AI o le a ufitia ai upu le talafeagai
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Fa'agaoioi tali otometi pe a pisi a'u
aiSettings.saveFailed: Le manuia le sefeina o fa'atulagaga AI
aiSettings.translateAll: Fa'aliliu fe'au uma o lo'o sau
aiSettings.modeAll: Fe'au uma o lo'o ulufale mai

accessibilitySettings.title: Avanoa & Fa'ailo
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Filifiliga e fa'afaigofie ai Chatforia e aunoa ma le fa'alagolago tele i leo.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSize: Tele o le mata'itusi o le 'interface'
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: E amata i le tele masani. Fa'atele pe a e mana'o i mata'itusi tetele.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Fa'ailo va'aia mo fe'au & vala'au
Fa'aali fa'amalama ma emo le ulutala ina ne'i misia ni gaioiga.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Lulu pe a iai se fe'au fou (pe a lagolagoina)
Fa'aoso le lulu o le masini ma fa'ailo.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Fa'amalamalama le lau pe a vala'au mai
Sulu pupula pu'upu'u pe a tatagi le vala'au.
accessibilitySettings.captionFontSize: Tele o le mata'itusi o fa'amatalaga
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Fa'aliliu otometi fe'au leo
Fa'apipi'i se fa'amatalaga i fe'au leo o lo'o e maua.
accessibilitySettings.loadFailed: Le manuia le la'uina o fa'atulagaga
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Fa'aali fa'amalama ma emo le ulutala ina ne'i misia ni gaioiga.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Lulu pe a i ai fe'au fou (pe a lagolagoina)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Fa'aoso le lulu o le masini i fa'ailo.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Fa'amalamalama le lau pe a vala'au mai
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Sulu pupula pu'upu'u pe a tatagi le vala'au.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Teu na'o le 'ciphertext' i le server. Tape AI/Fa'aliliu ma va'aiga fa'atonutonu.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Su'e e ala i le alias, igoa, username, po'o le telefoni
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: Nisi auala vave e amata ai.
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Fa'asoa lau so'otaga valaaulia e amata ai vave talanoaga.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Nofo fesoota'i i le alu i Chatforia mo iOS ma Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Fautuaga: E tumau le fa'asinotonu o au fe'au i le upega ma le telefoni.

randomChat.title: Talanoaga Fa'afuase'i
randomChat.description: Feiloa'i vave ma se tagata fou. O le a matou fa'atatauina ma tatala se potu talanoaga tumau le taimi.
randomChat.noPartner: Leai se paga i le taimi nei.
randomChat.saveGuard: Na'o talanoaga tagata-i-tagata e mafai ona sefe

login.title: Afio mai toe
login.subtitle: Ulufale i lau tala Chatforia
login.ssoUnavailable: Le avanoa le Single-sign-on i le taimi nei. Fa'aoga le username & password.

error.invalid: Le sa'o le username po'o le password
error.unprocessable: Talosaga le aoga. Siaki lau username/imeli ma le password.
error.deviceLimit: Ua o'o le tapula'a masini mo le Fuafuaga Free. Ulufale'ese i se isi masini pe fa'afou i le Premium e so'oga ai nisi masini.
error.premiumRequired: E mana'omia le Fuafuaga Premium mo lenei gaioiga.
